entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bloodvein
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berens River Airport 11:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
